cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on September 14, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8813, AFFECT Human Rights in Venezuela Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 147 (Tuesday, September 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SIRES:
H.R. 8813.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3(d)(1) of rule XIII of the Rules of the
House of Representatives, the Committee finds the authority
for this legislation in article I, section 8 of the
Constitution.
[Page H7784]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: AFFECT Human Rights in Venezuela Act
